data.title: Surprising
data.text:
My wife tricked me into going here by saying it was a cafe. I am not a vegan but will admit the lunch was good. I had the Taco Supreme's and was pleasantly surprised. Instead of ground beef they mixed coarsely chopped and whole red beans as a protein. It was well seasoned and tasty. For desert we had the sweet potato pie as it was the only item available. If I were a vegan I think I would rate this 5 star excellent.
I would recommend a stop here if only to give it a try, If you like it, go back. If not, you have had a new experience. Service was a bit slow but so what, relax and enjoy.

data.title: Food is delicious
data.text: But the service is sooooooo slow. The food was amazing though. The choices are somewhat limited and the atmosphere is laid back. If you have a hankering for some really super great flavorful vegan food with a laid back island vibe and you don't mind waiting a loooonnnggg (but worth it) time for it (and you aren't starving) definitely go here!

data.title: Surprisingly great!
data.text: The food was very flavorful and quite tasty, filling and not overly expensive!  Definitely recommend.  I had the almond taco things and it was very very good!

data.title: Real Food Back To The Soul
data.text:
I loved the spirit of this restarant.  All of the staff were friendly and gave me the feel of being part of a village. 

The food was all organic and prepared with consciousness.  After a long discussion with one of the staff, I realized that their hearts were into health.  Most of all they stressed to me the importance of "eating to live," rather that "living to eat."

Most importantly the meal I had was delightful.  The "Tacos Supreme," was avacodo, tomato, lettuce and blackbeans.  To top in off I had an awesome kale salad.

This was real food that touches the soul.  They also feature 9.5 alkaline water free of charge.  They didn't miss a healthy beat.  Also the price and quantity are good.

data.title: Warm community gathering place, tasty food
data.text: Wholesome, social justice oriented and tasty! Don't go in a hurry -- service can be on the slow side, but you'll want to hang around for a while anyway.

data.title: Must visit for amazing food in Durham, NC
data.text: The food, energy and beauty of this cafe is an essential visit if you come to Durham or live here.  The food is cooked with massive amounts of love and flavor.

data.title: Wonderful cafe
data.text:
Warm friendly environment and staff
Lunch special of beautifully spiced black eye peas over coconut rice and kale salad; one of the nicest lunches I've had
But save room for the cheesecake which I didn't!
Met the chef and cheesecake maker
I'll return  and take friends

data.title: 經典的美國素食餐廳
data.text:
經典的美國素食餐廳
這家餐廳以素食風味聞名，我最喜歡他們家的baked plantains,味道濃郁，軟糯香甜。沙拉選擇Spiced chick peas也很不錯，有一點點辣味，但是又不會太過頭，剛剛好，非常推薦的一家餐廳
